title: 1.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
For the below variables, write a pseudocode to obtain input from the user.
bookName
bookAuthor
bookPages
bookPrice
bookIsAvailable
Also, write the datatypes for the above variables.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
